modShortDescription: This mod allows you to add the server info panel to the pause screen. Press ESC to open the panel.
modDescription:
This mod allows you to add the server info panel to the pause screen. Press ESC to open the panel.

Just change the text in the **windows.xml** file.

## Changelog

Updated for A20.

**[Download](https://yehonal.github.io/DownGit/#/home?url=https://github.com/sLimLong/Info-Panel-Server/tree/main/InfoPanel)** for A20  
**[Download](https://yehonal.github.io/DownGit/#/home?url=https://github.com/sLimLong/Info-Panel-Server/tree/main/InfoPanel_a19)** for A19

The forum topic of the mod is [here](https://community.7daystodie.com/topic/20526-info-panel-server/).

**Credits:** [Slimlong103](https://7daystodiemods.com/tag/slimlong103/)
